title: Jaxona
description: Jaxona is a project for a jokes database. It's a React Web Application and at the moment more features are being implemented on it. Design and Web Development by Bax Uva.

title: Moige
description: Moige is a fun oracle that helps you when you don't know what to wear. Each realoading gives you a a final group of items you should wear. It is a Vue Web Application. Design and Web Development by Bax Uva.

title: Aline Baiana
description: Aline Baiana is a visual artist based in Berlin and this is her portfolio made with Wordpress CMS. Design and Web Development by Bax Uva and Marina Sarno.

title: Die Wilde Jagd
description: Die Wilde Jagd is the musical project of Sebastian Lee Philipp, artist based in Berlin. This is his personal website, made with HTML and CSS. Design by Sebastian Lee Philipp and Bax Uva. Web Development by Bax Uva.

title: É
description: É is an independent publisher in São Paulo, Brazil. This is their catalog website, made with HTML and CSS. Web Design: Bax Uva and Júlia Rocha. Web Development: Bax Uva.

title: Fantasmas
description: Fantasmas is a web experiment, part of and containing Renata Passos' master thesis in Visual Arts. It's a website made with HTML and CSS. Web Design: Renata Passos and Bax Uva. Web Development: Bax Uva. Obs: it's for desktop format only.
